entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and overnight. Snow mixed with rain beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
